article_title: Ed Lasky on governors and the Muslim 'refugees'
article_text: AT co-founder Ed Lasky, author of today’s lead article on President Obama, appeared last night on the Chicago PBS station WTTW to discuss the resistance to accepting more Muslim “refugees.” Needless to say, he was double-teamed, but he held his own. The video is below:

og.title: Blog: Ed Lasky on governors and the Muslim 'refugees'

article_summary:
AT co-founder Ed Lasky, author of today’s lead article on President Obama, appeared last night on the Chicago PBS station WTTW to discuss the resistance to accepting more Muslim “refugees.” Needless to say, he was double-teamed, but he held his own.
The video is below:
